statements: SELECT * FROM customer_demand WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, demand_quantity FROM customer_demand WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(demand_quantity) AS total_demand FROM customer_demand GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, demand_quantity FROM customer_demand ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_id FROM customer_demand WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM customer_demand WHERE demand_quantity > 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(demand_quantity) AS total_demand FROM customer_demand GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT AVG(demand_quantity) AS average_demand FROM customer_demand WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_demand WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, MAX(demand_quantity) AS max_demand FROM customer_demand GROUP BY customer_id HAVING max_demand > 200;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_id, category, quantity FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_id ASC, price DESC;
SELECT sale_date, total_revenue FROM sales WHERE product_id=3 AND quantity_sold > 5 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM products WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT sale_date, total_revenue FROM sales WHERE quantity_sold > 5 ORDER BY sale_date DESC, total_revenue ASC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_quantity_sold FROM sales GROUP BY product_id HAVING SUM(quantity_sold) > 20 ORDER BY total_quantity_sold DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.product_id WHERE total_revenue > 500 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT sale_date, quantity FROM sales WHERE sale_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, product_name, quantity FROM customers c JOIN sales s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id WHERE s.quantity > 5;

SELECT customer_name, sale_date, category FROM customers c JOIN sales s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id JOIN products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, category, SUM(quantity) AS total_sales FROM products p JOIN sales s ON p.product_id = s.product_id GROUP BY product_name, category;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, sale_date, quantity FROM sales ORDER By sale_date DESC;
SELECT trend_name, start_date, end_date FROM trends WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, quantity, total_amount FROM sales WHERE quantity > 5 AND total_amount < 500 ORDER BY total_amount ASC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description, start_date, end_date FROM trends WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_catalog WHERE price > 50;
SELECT customer_id, gender, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_catalog ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, age, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY location DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_catalog WHERE category IN ('Electronics', 'Clothing') ORDER BY price DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, purchase_date FROM purchase_history WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, recommendation_score FROM product_recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 0.8 ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC, customer_id ASC LIMIT 3;
